website_summaries.verdict: If you have a smart TV made after 2016 and need a seamless PC-like control setup, this is the keyboard for you.
pros: Optimized for 4K LG, Samsung, and Sony smart TVs
cons: Backlit keys would have been a nice feature

customer_reviews.title: Clumsy
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the K380 for years. This one is clumsy to use. The mouse pad is way too small, and the right left mouse buttons are on the wrong side. I had it for one day and I knew it was not right for me.
customer_reviews.author: Critic

customer_reviews.title: Didn't meet my needs.
customer_reviews.text: 1. Tried to connect to Fire TV. Kept getting message that connection was unsuccessful. Try again. Found out that Fire TV is not supported. 2. Connected by bluetooth to iPhone. Tried typing a message. Found out that emoji/auto correct not supported. 3. Need unifying receiver to connect to TV or PC. Need another unifying receiver if I want to do both. 4. Connected by bluetooth to Apple TV. Worked ok, except couldn't control volume. 5. Connected unifying receiver to my new Mac Mini running Mojave. Mini didn't see it. Don't know why. My Victsing wireless keyboard works fine.` Other than the above I guess K600 was fine, just not for me, so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Coffelt

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice and well built piece of equipment. However it was a bit more difficult to set up than it should have been because all the information we need is not found all at the same place. I had questions about the switch keys, the dongles, the bluetooth, and the pairing. This is learned via Google searches and Amazon reviews. Going into this I had a question if it works with three dongles OR one dongle + two bluetooths. I still do not know the answer to that. As it turned out, I used one dongle plus one bluetooth. Once this is setup and working, it is great.
customer_reviews.author: stan p.

customer_reviews.title: Great Keyboard but it ends there.
customer_reviews.text: Like mentioned in the title The keys and their shape are great but the trackpad and the fact that mouse controls are on the left side of the board as Logitech tries to reinvent what's been working for years now. What's up with that constant fighting I have to do with lack of scrolling and it magnifying internet pages. I enabled a browser plugin to make the trackpad behave like any other trackpad. I still have to use the D-pad or arrows to scroll a page! Why is Logitech not sending software to control the keyboard functions anymore?? What has been mentioned could have been resolved with software. Ugh! I wish I kept the box to return it.
customer_reviews.author: MattMan

customer_reviews.title: Works great with LGTV, Apple TV, and Mac Laptop
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup with the help of the K600 setup website. I like that it has support for up to three devices (1x dongle, 2x bluetooth). My primary use is to control a Mac laptop for streaming and browsing on the TV and it works great. The only downside is that LGTV's YouTube app doesn't support keyboard entry :-( The other apps, incl. Amazon Prime for LGTV, work just fine! I really like the trackpad too!
customer_reviews.author: IT Dude in Austin

customer_reviews.title: Best TV keyboard I have found
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased a number of TV keyboards over the last couple of years. This is the best one yet. It supports 3 devices and has the ability to set it into a mode so that specially keys like the home key work correctly. For example, switch it to Fire TV and set the mode to Android and the home key on the keyboard works like the home key on your Fire TV remote. Switch to Samsung TV, set the mode, it works like the home key on your Samsung remote.
customer_reviews.author: drmutus

customer_reviews.title: much better after removing installation sticker
customer_reviews.text: this thing doesn't have right (and left) trackpad buttons under the pad. but it does have them hidden under the installation sticker on the left, which might be more convenient. ( you can also tap 2 fingers to simulate a right click ). up to 3 connections, not obvious how to connect to 2nd and 3rd device using an extra unifying receiver if you have one, Bluetooth connection works ok so far. not sure how secure / hackproof the connection is though. inexplicable 3rd step of setup requires internet connection. uses 2aaa batteries. no direct connection via usb cable, not rechargable.
customer_reviews.author: Computer Guy

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work as expected with LG OLED TV.
customer_reviews.text: Does not work with LG WebOS on my OLED tv. While thw keyboard connects and updates, the trackpad does not work when web browsing. That makes this keyboard useless to me. I returned one for a replacement, only to have the same issue. I contacted Logitech support who decided to send me a 3rd keyboard because it's supposed to work. That keyboard never arrived, so I returned the keyboard I had to Amazon for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Seymour Halpern

customer_reviews.title: too expensive but worse than k400
customer_reviews.text: a foolish buy. 1. unnecessarily heavy: must hold with 2hands 2. takes aaa batteries: this is just nuts. the weight is not even from the battery! 3. bt connection lost occasionally 4. receiver won't work either if bt fails(what???) 5. yes you need another input device to rescue this poor thing 6. really weird keyboard design: you can't discern which key is which by touching(it all feels the same and spaced evenly together) (jeez at least set volume keys away!) 7. and I paid like what? 60 70$ for this thing? was I that stupid? get a k400 and you'll be much happier. although it looks better than k400 I'll give you that. (it isn't)
customer_reviews.author: maccab

customer_reviews.title: Easy Setup with our new 65 inch Sony Bravia
customer_reviews.text: setup was quick and easy, interfaces very nicely with our new 65 inch Sony. Love the Home button. Will likely buy another one for our 2nd, older 50 inch Sony. Did make the extra step of adding a short USB extension cable to the TV ensure the universal interface fob wasn't hidden behind the equipment, thus maximizing the keyboard's range.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas F. Marks

customer_reviews.title: Touchpad scroll speed is broken / non-adjustable on mac os
customer_reviews.text: Everything was working fine until I tried to scroll on a web page. Damn, the speed is ridiculous! There is no way to adjust it in logi settings (only pointer speed) and I suspect that logi options overrides the system setting, because trying to set it up in mac os settings (accessibility options and regular settings) haven't affected the scroll speed. Scrolling is probably the major feature for me and as of the moment it's unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Andrey

customer_reviews.title: Touchpad very poor, Onlline setup gone.
customer_reviews.text: It does work without the online setup, but is is not very slick and is not acceptable. The Touchpad is very insensitive and slow. There does not appear to be any way to customize it. The website to set up the final six special keys does not exist and the URL generates a 401 error. Because it is black with faint lettering, it is hard to see the keys in a darkened room. I expected much better from Logitech but did not get it. Mac OSX 10.13 via Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: SciFiOne

customer_reviews.title: Really?  No left or right mouse buttons near touchpad?
customer_reviews.text: Idiotic design has a touchpad that you can click, it can click in 4 axis, so it should be pretty easy to make it function as left and right buttons on a mouse. But NOOOOOOOO, that would make too much sense. They put a tiny chicklet on the opposite side of the keyboard. Ridiculous. Very unfortunate, as the design and typing feel are excellent. But useless for use on a computer.
customer_reviews.author: William M.

customer_reviews.title: The AAA should get and upgrade next round to at least AA for added time
customer_reviews.text: Ir only works with LE Bluetooth. It worked Samsung chromebook 3, Lenovo 10" tablet and Galaxy S6 and up. I dont have any older to test with. Switch between PCs is not easy sometimes. I would never use it for a TV anyway. It would be nice if I could have 2 more USB adapters so I could still use bluetooth for music. I would say wrong angle selling this for a TV though. 3PC's that I can use 1 keyboard and 1 mouse on with a switch is what it is best for.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Great style, durable, and very convenient to switch devices but terrible trackpad
customer_reviews.text: I like the new circle keys very much. The keys have perfect travel. The setup is very easy and clear. Very convenient to use in the living room. Also, the touchpad can be clicked so don't worry about the left and right-click button on the left of the keyboard. The overall build quality seems good and durable. However, I found the trackpad very difficult to use after a few months. Two-finger scrolling very easy to turn into zoom-in. Also just found that the price drop from $70 down to $50. I wish I bought it later.
customer_reviews.author: Louis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: When I bought it, I thought it was little expensive but its pleasure using this keyboard. Amazing ease of use, quick to pair and just awesome. I use Mac to remote connect my work Windows virtual machine and this keyboard just seamlessly handles both. When on Mac, it honors all Mac commands and the moment I flip to Windows, it gives me back my much needed ALT and CNTRL buttons. :) Build is high quality and works really well. Definitely recommend this product to all.
customer_reviews.author: Swanand Vaze

customer_reviews.title: Great quality inbetween sized keyboard for those who don't like to use a mouse.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because I don't like using a mouse and I really like the left mouse button on the keyboard. The layout and size is bigger than the K400 model, but still more cramped than standard keyboards. But it was expected due to the nature of the setup. Really like the key feel and the touch pad tracks well, though more sensetive than most.
customer_reviews.author: Shana Merl

customer_reviews.title: Key popped off inside first hour of use.
customer_reviews.text: Sleek. Feels solid. Haven't used with smart TV yet, only team red machine. H key popped off first time it fell from a seated position. I don't feel that's extreme abuse for a tv keyboard. Popped back on eventually, but was a little tricky. Fell again, less severely even than the first time. Popped off again. Did I just get lucky?
customer_reviews.author: Keith Ragan

customer_reviews.title: Responsive quaility build
customer_reviews.text: I've had several wireless keyboards over the last few years... some outright sucked, some were ok. I got this one because I had good luck with one from the same manufacturer. Logitech did this one right. The keys feel great, the "mouse pad" works awesome. What else is there to say?
customer_reviews.author: Gorgehiker

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to type on, the trackpad's responsiveness is a joke, the Windows keys are seemingly non-functional, and it's nearly impossible to click and drag things without issue. Also this thing is surprisingly and uncomfortably heavy to be using as a portable living room keyboard. The Logitech K830 was a much better choice and the replacement for this awkward mess.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Check carefully for TV compatibility
customer_reviews.text: Good build and features. Does not work well with an LG OLED TV (2019), which is the intended use. Would have appreciated disclosure of limitations, but will live with the marginal improvement over the TV remote control.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Cleverly Designed
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is really something. Very intuitive to use, keys have a nice separation, and they feel GOOD. Touchpad is large enough and has gesture support. LOVE the multi-profile with Bluetooth AND the wireless dongle that came with it. Batteries last a very long time, I have yet to replace them and I've had this for 7 months now.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Works well with Android TV
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to go with a Sony android tv. It was very easy to set up - just plug in the usb dongle and turn it on. The keyboard is compact and lightweight. It makes using apps on the tv so much simpler than trying to hunt and select letter by letter with a remote and the touchpad is a convenient feature for navigating.
customer_reviews.author: S.S.R.

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible with all TVs
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a keyboard to type on my smart TV, specifically youtube. I bought the K400 first and it would not type in youtube. I called the manufacturer 646-454-3200 and they said the K600 would work, but it didn't. I called them back and they said the K600 was not compatible with my TV. I'm going to keep this stupid keyboard because it's better than nothing but I feel pretty disappointed with Logitech, especially the lying part. :(
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Crowder

customer_reviews.title: CHECK COMPATIBILITY OF TV WITH MFG BEFORE BUYING
customer_reviews.text: LOGITECH K600 TV not compatible with my SAMSUNG 55" TV. Checked prior and compatibility info was inaccurate. After unit was tried, tested compatibillity again...NOT compatible. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: SeniorSkier@72

customer_reviews.title: Ships without a receiver
customer_reviews.text: Got a keyboard without a receiver. What were they thinking? Every Logitech product I have ever bought shipped with a receiver. They expect you to pay another $14 for that?
customer_reviews.author: yuanzhoulv

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my application
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a keyboard to make it easier to enter necessary information and this fit the bill perfectly. I had no problems at all with connecting the device or using it. For my application, this was the perfect choice.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Trackpad does not work with Apple TV - including Steam Link
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice keyboard, well made, balanced...but I wanted to use it to play games via Steam Link on my Apple TV. While it can control app selection and type in search items - the track pad does not work when using Steam Link and it does not type in games.
customer_reviews.author: DrMindcrime

customer_reviews.title: It is very slow and freezes
customer_reviews.text: it takes up to 3 seconds to wake up and goes to sleep mode very fast (like in 10 seconds). Volume and arrow buttons get lock going all the way up or down, some times can be reset by turning off and on the keyboard or the Bluetooth but other times a computer restart is needed making something simple and easy a real headache. Don't waste your money!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Maryia S.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Performance!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly with my Samsung QLED 4K. Simple to use.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl R

customer_reviews.title: Thoughtful Logitech Design and Quality Construction
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is a joy to use and was easy to set up. It replaces the maddening process of using an on-screen keyboard with one that works just just as expected. That fact alone makes it worth several times the affordable purchase price.
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: Ability to control 3 devices makes this a winner.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not super crazy about the rounded design, but being able to control 3 different devices with the same keyboard makes this device superior. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Rygon

customer_reviews.title: You need this...like we did.
customer_reviews.text: If you have a Smart TV (ours are all Samsung) this is an absolute essential. It makes navigating apps, typing searches and moving around the screen and menus a breeze. I just bought a 2nd one for another Smart TV we have. Yeah, I have voice command and I still use it...but for fast, easy control of your TV, this is definitely the ticket.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Crouch

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard works amazingly well. I have it hooked up to shield TV, iPhone, and windows 10 computer and works perfectly with all three.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I don't write many reviews, but I have to say that this is a great keyboard for my TV, Amazon Fire Cube TV, and tablet. Easy to pair. Very sturdy. Smooth typing. I would recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: RPatt3

customer_reviews.title: Did not support my TV
customer_reviews.text: Although claiming to support Samsung smart TV's, this keyboard did not support my Samsung smart TV, as I found out after I received it. So I returned the device to Amazon. I was disappointed, because I am typing this on my Mac with a Logitech keyboard that I like very much.
customer_reviews.author: aej174

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard for intended purpose.
customer_reviews.text: Great keyboard for it's intended purpose, perhaps my only criticisms would be more than 3 devices would be nice as well as a "no device" position. The "no device" is because if its currently selected to a device and it gets accidentally bumped or pressed, it can unintentionally wake up that device.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Von Gauss

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with Samsung Netflix app
customer_reviews.text: I got this for the sole purpose of logging into my Netflix account from my TV as Samsung's Netflix repeatedly makes me put in my password even though I'm logged into my smarthub account. The keyboard works with the rest of the menu options and the internet app, but does NOT work with entering the password on the Netflix app.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Works great on PC. Says won’t work in my LG 55UH6150, but it does. Plugged receiver into TV USB port.
customer_reviews.author: Byron W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Solution for TV Typing
customer_reviews.text: I can actually type in the search boxes on YouTube and other TV based applications.
customer_reviews.author: Michael H

customer_reviews.title: Great entertainment keyboard
customer_reviews.text: This subtle keyboard is great for any home theater set up. It has convenient keys, is light, well designed, and includes the provision to handle multiple devices.
customer_reviews.author: Anton

customer_reviews.title: Some function key can't control the LG TV
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to control my LG 65UK6500AUA smart TV which uses WebOS. I've paired it correctly, and chose the LG WebOS correctly. Most keys are function correctly. But the back arrow key "<-- "on the left side doesn't function at all. It can't go back as the same way the LG remote controller can do. Do you have the K600 firmware update available to support it?
customer_reviews.author: BigBen

customer_reviews.title: Superb keyboard.
customer_reviews.text: Great keyboard. Looks very sturdy and high quality. The buttons feels good upon typing, switching between different devices works very fast. The touchpad is small but I never felt a need for a bigger one, it's accurate and respond well. The keyboard is a bit heavier than my previous k400+ . Highly recommended for those who need a multi device wireless, combo keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Atothem

customer_reviews.title: Used on Smart TV
customer_reviews.text: Works great for smart TV but not all functions work across all applications. Comes with small USB receiver that plugs into back of TV so make sure you have a slot available.
customer_reviews.author: Stickdog

customer_reviews.title: Great for home theater and multiple devices
customer_reviews.text: Excellent keyboard. I have it paired to a PC, laptop and a tv. Knew going in it wasn't illuminated but if it were it would be perfect. I would also buy two more, but it's still great for home theater.
customer_reviews.author: Mel E.

customer_reviews.title: dead after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: dead after 3 months, sounds as something is loose inside, the keyboard wasn't abused or dropped. Trying to file a warranty claim, unsuccessful so far.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Best wireless keyboard for Pi/Kodi setup
customer_reviews.text: Running a Raspberry Pi with Kodi and needed a decent wireless multimedia keyboard. I used a k400 before but it broke in a year. This has been an excellent replacement and I just hope that it lasts a while.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Flanick

customer_reviews.title: Could not go wrong with Logitech
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup. Quick sync and easy to use. Some app search doesn't support keyboard. Yet it is not the keyboard's fault.
customer_reviews.author: Montrealia

customer_reviews.title: Walk-in retail has its advantages - you can open the package before purchase
customer_reviews.text: Both packages had the USB receivers pilfered. Customer Service (Angel) has it handled, BUT, these $11.00 items are necessary for function. Question: Why wouldn’t [they] steal the dammed batteries as well ???
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for movie search
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to use it for searches of movies in Amazon. Didn't work.
customer_reviews.author: mkar

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Definitely glad I spring for the nicer one than others on Amazon. Setup is super easy and the functionality is pretty much everything I could have wanted with me Android smart TV. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Logitech K600 TV - TV Keyboard with Integrated Touchpad
customer_reviews.text: This is a excellent keyboard... it work great with my Samsung smart tv, fire tablet 9 gen, and my windows 8 Dell desk top pc.... when using in Youtube with Roku it with not work but with the smart TV using Youtube it works fine... this is one of the best buy ever.... Thank you Amazon for having this keyboard available....
customer_reviews.author: Kathy W

customer_reviews.title: Could Not Get it to Work
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to use it with my smart tv as the monitor and be able to go to Google search. Instructions provided with the product were incorrect. Going to there was no help. Going to U tube did not help. Finally got frustrated and put back in the box and put on the self in closet. Money wasted for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Pushea

customer_reviews.title: Double plus hyper good.
customer_reviews.text: This is just a great value. It flips between a keyboard/mouse for the TV, the laptop and the smartphone with ease. I will always have one of these until something better techwise comes along. No normal wired or wireless keyboard hits the new standard set by this.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard for Android TV
customer_reviews.text: Keyboard works well with my Sony Bravia. Only have limited use for it so far but is excellent when I need to enter more than a few characters at any given time.
customer_reviews.author: Greg James

customer_reviews.title: Realy very good.
customer_reviews.text: Thanks for everything. But I want to buy case for item, They doesn't sending to Turkey.
customer_reviews.author: Kanar1907

customer_reviews.title: odd key design
customer_reviews.text: 3 Bluetooth channels easy to select device The touch pad is not the best
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Dunne

customer_reviews.title: Oh yes, just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: This device connects to my LG TV and to my iPad Pro 11. Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy B

customer_reviews.title: First Bluetooth keyboard that worked with a Samsung OLED Smart.
customer_reviews.text: So far I have not had any problems with the keyboard. It does what I bought it for. Just seemed a bit pricey
customer_reviews.author: Able Devildog

customer_reviews.title: Best SmartTV Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Great Smart TV keyboards , this is by far the best smart tv keyboard
customer_reviews.author: Omar Martin

customer_reviews.title: Only plus over K-400 is Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.text: Don't bother. Buy the K-400. The difference in size is not enough to warrant the hassle of the mouse buttons not being under the track pad. Build quality IS of Logitech's expexted standard. They need to make a Bluetooth version of the K-400, and this isn't it.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk Moore

customer_reviews.title: better than past iterations
customer_reviews.text: if you have an older model, well worth the upgrade and even at double, triple the cost
customer_reviews.author: Social Justice

customer_reviews.title: Touch-pad did not work as it should. It would not move cursor as intended.
customer_reviews.text: Touch-pad was of poor quality. It did not function as intended. I returned it for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: must have for multimedia computer setup
customer_reviews.text: this single keyboard replaced two keyboards one for a mac and one for windows 10 plus added keyboard to amazon fire tv.
customer_reviews.author: L4d1k

customer_reviews.title: Good living room keyboard
customer_reviews.text: My only nitpick is the position of Z key. If it’s moved slightly to the left like any normal keyboard it would have been perfect.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: GREAT QUALITY!
customer_reviews.text: EXCELLENT BUILD QUALITY, LOVE IT AND WORKS AS IT SHOULD.
customer_reviews.author: Srini

customer_reviews.title: Ok product, not the best Logitech has done.
customer_reviews.text: Mouse pad doesn’t track so well but gets the job done for the living room PC
customer_reviews.author: T Shane

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as other logitech media keyboards
customer_reviews.text: The previous logitech media keyboard has a much better responsive trackpad. This one is horrible.
customer_reviews.author: N.B.

customer_reviews.title: Great deal and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Logitech never fails! This keyboard was super easy to setup and use. No problems at all. Great price too. No more using my stupid tv remote to type in usernames and passwords for netflix and other apps on my samsung tv.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. G

customer_reviews.title: Nice all in one keyboard and mouse.
customer_reviews.text: Positive : Multiple buttons. Trackpad. Sturdy Wish it had back light and solar panels to recharge the batteries. Using it for entertainment center.
customer_reviews.author: Remy Prevost

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: 2020 Sony X800H Windows 10 PC iPad 2019 all working perfectly with all features tested so far. the s/n on the box and the s/n on the keyboard do not match though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard to bolster Smart TV capabilities
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I probably would have been fine with just my TV remote but the K600 keyboard makes it extremely easy to navigate all the apps and options on my TV. It’s incredibly useful for apps like Spotify and for internet browsing. 5/5 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher P.

customer_reviews.title: It’s fine
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little weird to use but sure beats needing a mouse. The batteries die quick if you forget to turn it off. The quality is plasticy but fine.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Not brand new
customer_reviews.text: Works fine on Linux OS. One thing I do mind is it’s not brand new. Looks like a returned product and Amazon didn’t repack it.
customer_reviews.author: Yuhan Yang

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This works perfectly, the range is excellent, there is no delay, and the batteries last a long time. Fully satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Robert G

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and use.
customer_reviews.text: Works so much better than the on screen entry system for smart TV.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with Roku
customer_reviews.text: I bought to plugin to my Roku, it does not work with Roku, total complete big fail.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: best keyboard for your smart tv.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I can control my smart tv and more.
customer_reviews.author: batero4life

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible with Samsung and YouTube .
customer_reviews.text: Not adjustable, the main thing it's not working with the Youtube app on Samsung TV. It's not type in the search line.
customer_reviews.author: Farukh Khalpetov

customer_reviews.title: Needs number keypad
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing,its the best keyboard out there by far
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Nice, 100%
customer_reviews.text: Good product, easy to use, and 100% compatible with WebOS
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Martini

customer_reviews.title: Best wireless keyboard you can get.
customer_reviews.text: Used this for my LG smart TV and the product is amazing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Paul B.

customer_reviews.title: Had to reinstall W10 to make it connect properly
customer_reviews.text: Will update the review as I use it more, but right now, it's just average -- had to wipe my W10 install and start from scratch before it would recognize the keys of the keyboard in any way, in either bluetooth or receiver mode.
customer_reviews.author: Elderlan

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: works right out of the box. getting it registered with Logitech is an adventure that has not been completed though.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: Logitech K600 TV - TV Keyboard with Integrated Touchpad and D-Pad Compatible with Smart TV - Graphite Black
product_meta.description: The K600 TV is the smarter way to control your smart TV. Sit back and navigate grid layouts with the d-pad and control the cursor with the precision touchpad from up to 15-meters away. Familiar typing allows you to quickly search for content, enter your complicated mix-cased password, and browse the internet with ease. The dedicated media and navigation keys allow you to play and pause movies, control the volume, and immediately launch home and search screens. Connect the K600 TV to your smart TV, PC, and mobile devices – and switch between them with the touch of a button.
feature_bullets: All-in-one content navigation: use the integrated precision touchpad to control the cursor and the d-pad TO navigate common smart TV grid layouts
15-Meter  wireless range: get a reliable wireless connection with virtually no drop-offs for uninterrupted control of your smart TV or PC connected to TV – even in the largest living rooms
Easy-switch between devices: connect to your smart TV, Windows or Mac PC, and Android and iOS mobile devices – then switch between them with the tap of a button
Media keys to play and pause movies, control the volume, adjust screen brightness and more. The home, back, search, and switch app buttons have been specifically designed for use with your smart TV

Compatible with Samsung SUHD/UHD (Tizen 2016 or newer), LG OLED/SUHD/UHD (webOS 2016 or newer), Sony Bravia UHD (Android TV 2016 or newer); Bluetooth low energy technology. Please note that Sony LCD TVs are not currently supported.
